item.description:
Christmas happens! There is no better way to celebrate than with your funky, horn-driven, legendary NH Superband© pals, the Jumbo Circus Peanuts.
It happens this Saturday, December 22, at the Portsmouth VFW, Deer Street. Doors open at 8 pm.

~$10 admission.

~Value-priced cocktails (CHEAP!) ~Spotlessrestrooms ~Parquet dance floor ~Free parking


 It also happens to be Portsmouth's longest running Christmas party, this year in its 16th annual incarnation. The 2012 JCP Winter Soulstice Ball and Multi-Cultural Throw Down will this year feature classic Christmas songs from Alvin and the Chipmunks, Johnny Marks, the Ray Coniff Singers, and Tennessee Ernie Ford. Also, don't miss the old-fashioned Yankee swap with Roger Maris, Mickey Mantle, Whitey Ford and Yogi Berra. Not to mention appearances by Rudolph, Snow White, the Easter Bunny, and Richard Simmons dressed as Totie Fields. Hope you'll come. After all, what is Christmas without at least one flaming eggnog with your friends dancing to the funkiest pop, rock and soul this side of Bump City?

 

Liability Release: AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, DANCING, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: TONIGHT! Jumbo Circus Peanuts
